summary: A collection of example scripts that demonstrate how to train, fine‑tune, run inference (including parallel GPU/cluster execution), and evaluate automatic speech recognition (ASR) models with the NeMo toolkit, supporting CTC, RNNT, and hybrid decoding strategies and handling NeMo‑style manifests.
business_intent: Accelerate development and deployment of speech‑to‑text solutions by providing ready‑to‑use workflows for building, adapting, and assessing high‑accuracy ASR models in research and production environments.
